item.Q:
Write the character: Sòng
(BěiSòng de Sòng)
item.A:
surname Song; the Song dynasty (960-1279 AD); also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
北宋 BěiSòng the Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127)

traditional: 聰明
cōngmíng smart; clever; intelligent; bright

traditional: 競技
jìngjì tournament

traditional: 競爭
jìngzhēng to compete; competition

traditional: 競賽
jìngsài race

traditional: 競選
jìngxuǎn run for (electoral) office

traditional: 軍備競賽
jūnbèijìngsài arms race; armament(s) race

traditional: 運動競賽
yùndòngjìngsài athleticism
zūnchóng to revere; to admire; to honor; to venerate
chóngbài to worship; adoration
chóngjìng to revere; high esteem

Chóngmíng (N) Chongming (place in Shanghai)
chóngmíng Chongming
chónggāo majestic; sublime
tuīchóng value; accord great importance to

traditional: 撞擊
zhuàngjī to strike; to hit; to ram
pèngzhuàng collide

traditional: 頂撞
dǐngzhuàng contradict

traditional: 厲害
lìhai difficult to deal with; difficult to endure; ferocious; radical; serious; terrible; tremendous; violent

traditional: 厲聲
lìshēng stern voice

traditional: 嚴厲
yánlì severe; strict

traditional: 變本加厲
biànběnjīalì become aggravated; be further intensified

traditional: 明淨
míngjìng bright and clean; luminous

traditional: 淨化
jìnghuà purify

traditional: 白淨
báijìng (of skin) fair and clear
gōngyáng ram (male sheep)
shānyáng goat
mǔyáng ewe
yángmáo fleece; wool; woolen
yángpí sheepskin
yángqún flock of sheep
yángròu mutton
kùnhuò bewilder; perplexity; confused
yíhuò (a sense of) uncertainty; to feel unsure about sth; unconvincing; to puzzle over
míhuo to puzzle; to confuse; to baffle
màozi hat; cap
xiūmián to hibernate
dōngmián (biology) hibernation
shīmián (suffer from) insomnia
shuìmián sleeping; slumber

traditional: 山溝
shāngōu (n) valley; gully; (n) mountain region

traditional: 排水溝
páishuǐgōu gutter

traditional: 水溝
shuǐgōu gutter

traditional: 溝通
gōutōng communicate
shìsú profane; secular; worldly

traditional: 俗話
súhuà common saying; proverb

traditional: 俗語
súyǔ common saying; proverb

traditional: 習俗
xísú custom; tradition; local tradition; convention
tōngsú common; everyday; average

traditional: 風俗
fēngsú custom

traditional: 劉宋
LiúSòng Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing

BěiSòng the Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127)
běisòng Northern Song
Nánsòng the Southern Song dynasty (1127-1279 AD)
Sòngshǐ History of the Song dynasty, twentieth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史, composed under Toktoghan 脱脱 in 1345 during the Yuan 元 dynasty, 496 scrolls; (not to be confused with 宋書|宋书)
SòngTàizǔ Emperor Taizu of Song, posthumous title of the founding Song emperor Zhao Kuangyin 趙匡胤|赵匡胤 (927-976), reigned from 960
SòngJiàorén Song Jiaoren (1882-1913), politician of the revolutionary party involved in the 1911 Xinhai revolution, murdered in Shanghai in 1913

traditional: 宋書
Sòngshū History of Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 or Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋, sixth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史, compiled by Shen Yue 沈約 in 488 during Liang of the Southern dynasties 南朝梁, 100 scrolls; (not to be confused with 宋史)
